name: process_thermal_mass_furniture

arguments.name: selectedliving
arguments.display_name: Of what space type is the living space

arguments.name: selectedfbsmt
arguments.display_name: Of what space type is the finished basement

arguments.name: selectedufbsmt
arguments.display_name: Of what space type is the unfinished basement

arguments.name: selectedgarage
arguments.display_name: Of what space type is the garage

modeler_description: This measure creates constructions representing the internal mass of furniture in the living space, finished basement, unfinished basement, and garage. The constructions are set to define the internal mass objects of their respective spaces.
description: This measure creates internal mass for furniture in the living space, finished basement, unfinished basement, and garage.
